name: GitHub Actions: PR Label Conditional Jobs
description: PRのラベルに応じてジョブを実行する条件付きワークフロー。

files.template:
name: Label Conditional

on: [pull_request]

jobs:
  run-e2e-if-labeled:
    if: contains(join(github.event.pull_request.labels.*.name, ','), 'e2e')
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - run: echo 'Running E2E because label e2e is set'
  run-docs-if-labeled:
    if: contains(join(github.event.pull_request.labels.*.name, ','), 'docs')
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - run: echo 'Docs job triggered by docs label'
